amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to acquire a camera for the purpose of collecting or storing vehicle license plate numbers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to acquire a camera for the purpose of collecting or storing vehicle license plate numbers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 171 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
